entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
